pullrequest.title: Support generating dat file for the visibility range communication model

content.raw:
yeah that was the original behavior in gz9 version. 

I added a msg to let users know where the dat file is saved to.  [393bce9](#!/osrf/subt/commits/393bce97b0ed1c93b0cfdcd4148e1ca7322e1e02)

Now it prints out something like:

```
[Msg] File saved to: /home/osrf/code/subt_ws2/install/share/subt_ign/worlds/simple_cave_02.dat
```

‌
